attributes.action: Eat 10 Chicken Dinosaurs at the same time within 30 seconds Live on TV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it would be funny.

Terms:
Full size dinosaurs, not mini snack size ones.

Ps. This is not frivolous, this is a serious demand of the primeminister.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
